cn.title: 关于支持以太坊ETH君士坦丁堡（Constantinople）分叉的公告

message.data:
比特派将支持以太坊Ethereum（ETH）的君士坦丁堡（Constantinople）分叉，并将于区块高度7,080,000 进行快照（预计2019年01月14日-18日）。
为保障您的资产安全，建议您提前将ETH充值到钱包中，分叉期间避免 ETH 收发，比特派将协助您处理硬分叉中的一切技术问题。

en.title: Announcement on Supporting Etheruem (ETH) Constantinople Hard-fork

message.data:
Bitpie will support Ethereum (ETH) Constantinople fork.We will take a snapshot at the block height 7,080,000 (predicted time 2019 January 14-- January 18(UTC+8)).
To ensure your assets safety, it is strongly advised to send your ETH to your Bitpie wallet and pause the sends and receives during the fork period. Bitpie will help you deal with all technical issues in this hard-fork.
